channel.title: Projects on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Alfred - Robot
item.description: Table of contents Overview Main Tasks Software Hardware Overview Magic Mirror ALFRED is an emotional support robot that resides on my desk. The main purpose of the robot was to gain experience using Arduino microcontrollers, sensors, and servos. ALFRED is a 4 axis robotic arm, utilizing four servo motors and a gesture sensor (PAJ7620U2).

item.title: Fiber-Optics Table
item.description: Table of contents Overview Main Obstacles Carving Fiber-Optics Epoxy Takeaway Gallery Overview Fiber-optics Table The idea of this project was to make a unique, relatively inexpensive side table that would fit against my main table to form an L shaped desk.

item.title: Magic Mirror
item.description: Table of contents Overview Main Takeaways Raspberry Pi/Linux Software Concepts Overview Magic Mirror This project was an extremely fun, enlightening, and useful build. The magic mirror concept has been around for a while, so there are numerous github pages and videos explaining how to build one for yourself.
